Form.Comments: Create your track to remember your password (Optional)
Form.InfoFirst: Save all your passwords, date any information, forget the paper notes and the unprotected applications
Form.InfoSec: create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it
Form.HowDoesWork: First you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well
Form.HowCanData: For example, the number of your card, the PIN and the PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of any of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place
Form.InfoThird: First you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well
Form.InFoFour: You can also create a track to help you remember your master password
Form.ErrorMsg: We have not been able to modify your Master password. Try again later
Form.PassMangerAlreadyCreated: Your Password Manager is already created
Form.Success: Succesfully created the Master Password, Welcome!
